title: Unemployment rate in Northern Ireland ( UK ) 2000 to 2019
summary: In general Unemployment rate has rose over the Year.

Unemployment rate is roughly constant from 2002 to 2003, slightly decreasing from 2003 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2006, gradually increasing from 2006 to 2009, and lastly roughly constant from 2009 to 2011.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Unemployment rate, of value 7.2 was reached at Year 2011
The lowest Unemployment rate, of value 3.9 was reported at Year 2007
